buff.name: buffStressedCureDisplay
buff.description_key: Your have taken action to reduce your stress

buff.name: buffStressed01Untreated
buff.description_key: Find ways to relieve your stress
buff.tooltip_key: Find ways to relieve your stress

buff.name: buffStressed01GetBetter
buff.description_key: Your stress is going down

buff.name: buffStressed02Untreated
buff.description_key: Your stress is getting worse and is making you fatigued

buff.name: buffStressed02GetBetter
buff.description_key: Your stress is going down

buff.name: buffStressed03Untreated
buff.description_key: Find relief immediately! You're paranoia is affecting your ability to function!

buff.name: buffStressed03GetBetter
buff.description_key: Your stress is going down

buff.name: buffStressed04
buff.tooltip_key: You have taken your own life

buff.name: Suicide
buff.description_key: You have taken your own life
buff.tooltip_key: You have taken your own life

buff.name: Stoned01
buff.description_key: The weight of the world has been lifted off of your shoulders more a moment
buff.tooltip_key: You feel very relaxed but a bit too relaxed

buff.name: zombieAlertsmallAOEEffect
buff.description_key: Zombies are nearby.

buff.name: Stoned02
buff.description_key: Inspiration is flowing through you
buff.tooltip_key: You feel a bit relaxed but very focused

buff.name: Hungover
buff.description_key: Your drinking binge has led to horrible consequences
buff.tooltip_key: You are now hungover

buff.name: Paranoid
buff.description_key: Your seeing and hearing things that aren't really there
buff.tooltip_key: You are now paranoid from your stress

effect_group.name: apply lower buff if higher buff duration is low

buff.name: BoozeStaminaBonus
buff.description_key: For a limited time you have a boost of adrenaline

buff.name: Stout
buff.description_key: You're pretty sure this stout beer just put hairs on your chest
buff.tooltip_key: What a manly beer this is

buff.name: Pilsner
buff.description_key: This standard pilsner beer has energized you for the moment
buff.tooltip_key: This isn't the best beer but it isn't the worst either

buff.name: Porter
buff.description_key: This porter is very soothing and you feel warm
buff.tooltip_key: Porters hit quite right in the dead of winter

buff.name: PaleAle
buff.description_key: This pale ale gives you the strength to fight
buff.tooltip_key: This pale ale has a nice robust flavor

buff.name: Lager
buff.description_key: This charismatic drink is a household staple
buff.tooltip_key: Your charisma shines after slamming this lager

buff.name: IPA
buff.description_key: This IPA refreshes you in this heat
buff.tooltip_key: IPAs are so refreshing on the taste buds

buff.name: PumpkinAle
buff.description_key: Your immune system feels quite the boost
buff.tooltip_key: This is one well crafted pumpkin ale

buff.name: WheatAle
buff.description_key: What a great aroma and taste of this fine beer
buff.tooltip_key: You get the best of both worlds with this beer

buff.name: Whiskey
buff.description_key: Relieved but at what cost
buff.tooltip_key: I hope this was worth it
